glossdef.para: The process begins when one of the entry criteria is satisfied.

The Software Requirements, Function Specification, Usage Specification, Software Architecture, Reengineered Software, and Increment Construction Plan are sufficient for increment design, and a software increment is scheduled for development or change. These work products are the basis for developing the Increment Design, as well as a source of revisions to it.
An Increment Verification Report or Increment Certification Report identifies faults or failures requiring correction of the Increment Design.

formalpara.title: Entry work products and the following supporting work products are available
formalpara.para: The Engineering Change Log describes proposed changes.
